question: 続ける
sourceMnemonic: This is like <ja>続く</ja> except for now you're the one doing the continuing. Unfortunately, there's no good way to differentiate the two "continues" using just the meaning, but you can think of it this way: With <ja>ける</ja>, you really <reading>care</reading> about continuing this thing so you are continuing it (doing the action of continuing). With <ja>く</ja> you're just like "that's <reading>coo'</reading> if it continues, but I don't really care...
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>続く</ja>, so be sure to know that so you can know this.
